creator: greyli
title: Batch File Replicator
description: This project creates a batch file replicator that, when executed, will open itself infinitely. It's intended to demonstrate potentially harmful batch file behavior and should be used with caution, as it may lead to system instability or require manual shutdown.
steps: Open Notepad (or a similar text editor) and save the file with a '.bat' extension, ensuring to select 'All Files' as the file type.
In the newly created .bat file, type the following command: start "" **

Replace the first set of quotation marks with the file's full directory path (e.g., C:\Users\YourName\Documents). Obtain this path by right-clicking the file, selecting 'Properties,' and copying the 'Location' field.
Replace the asterisks (**) with the name of the batch file (without the '.bat' extension).
The final command should resemble: start "C:\Users\YourName\Documents" filename
Save the .bat file and execute it. Be aware that this will cause the file to open itself repeatedly. Close it promptly and use with extreme caution.
